projects.title: Resume / presentation website
projects.description: A presentation app built for myself containing information like: resume, who am I and what I do, hobbies and more.

projects.title: React Weather App
projects.description: A weather app built with React and Express which enables the user to search the weather in certain cities around the world. The app automatically detects your location and displays the weather information that is most relevant to you.

projects.title: Web Sockets Chat
projects.description: A web chat application built with React on the FE and socket.io running on the BE. Users can connect to the chat room and exchange messages with each other.

projects.title: Url Shortener
projects.description: A web app created with VueJS and Express that enables the users to create short URLs. (similar to bit.ly). The 'Copy to clipboard' feature might not work due to the fact that the SSL certificate expired (https -> http).

projects.title: Disease predictor
projects.description: I engineered, fine-tuned, and validated a Neural Network that takes medical symptoms as input and forecasts the most likely corresponding disease. This model serves as the central element of a Flask-based backend server, which I also developed. This server is part of a custom API designed to interact with a frontend, accepting symptom data and returning the predicted disease.

projects.title: Smoke detector
projects.description: A smoke-detection system built using Python. When a certain value of gas or smoke is detected, I'm getting notified via email with a warning containing the details.
